name: Trulux - LIPLEX 22
description: Trulux offers LIPLEX 22, a patented lipid complex designed to deliver skin surface lipid profile. Noncomedogenic and botanically sourced, LIPLEX 22 is ideal for barrier repair in acne-prone and sensitive skin formulations. The patented formulation ensures optimal lipid composition for skin barrier support without pore clogging.

Trulux is a specialty cosmetic ingredients innovator offering LIPLEX 22, a patented lipid complex featuring noncomedogenic, botanically sourced lipids designed to deliver a skin surface lipid profile. Ideal for barrier repair, acne-prone skin, and sensitive skin formulations with patented biomimetic technology.
notes: Patented lipid complex delivers skin surface lipid profile. Noncomedogenic testing ensures suitability for acne-prone skin. Botanically sourced for clean beauty appeal. Designed for barrier repair without pore clogging. Excellent for sensitive and acne-prone skin formulations.

Specialty cosmetic ingredients innovator with patented technology. LIPLEX 22 is a patented lipid complex featuring noncomedogenic, botanically sourced lipids designed to deliver skin surface lipid profile. Ideal for barrier repair in acne-prone and sensitive skin formulations where traditional lipids may cause comedogenicity. Patented formulation ensures unique positioning in premium barrier repair market.
